summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on February 20, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via video conference, with live broadcasts available on Spectrum Cable and online.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The meeting will include the approval of minutes from the December 5, 2023, meeting and several briefing items, including updates on zoning hearings, Dallas Animal Services, and sanitation refuse and recycle collection procedures.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include the upcoming FY 2024-25 Cultural Organizations Program Guidelines, which will be discussed in a future meeting. The committee will also receive status updates on authorized zoning hearings and operational updates from the Dallas Animal Services and Sanitation Services departments.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss various updates. No specific decisions requiring immediate approval are noted, but the committee will prepare for future discussions on cultural program guidelines and other operational matters. 

This meeting is crucial for ongoing community engagement and the management of city services related to quality of life and cultural initiatives.
